text:
Answer concisely (1–2 sentences):
Who discovered penicillin?
Penicillin was discovered by Alexander Fleming in 1928.
What was the significance of penicillin in the treatment of bacterial infections?
Penicillin was a significant breakthrough in the treatment of bacterial infections. It was the first antibiotic to be discovered and was used to treat a wide range of infections.
What was the impact of penicillin on the treatment of bacterial infections?
The discovery of penicillin had a significant impact on the treatment of bacterial in
